name: Apocalypse Now
overview: Set the gravity for your game and fuel up, blow up enemy helicopters and navigate your way into tight underground passages to save the Prisoners of War. I love the sound of choppers in the morning, it is the sound of victory! Game was published in multiple German language disk magazines including 64'er 1984/10, 64'er Sonderheft 1985/06, and 64'er Spielesammlung #2.
